job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <ul><li>Thorough command of both the Windows and Linux Operating Systems, with strong background in troubleshooting either</li><li>Knowledge of native Kubernetes or related enterprise container platforms such as Open Shift</li><li>Good understanding of the mechanics of this platform and the deployment pipeline that feeds it</li><li>Knowledge of Public Cloud Governance frameworks, architectures, configurations, services, and solutions, specifically within Microsoft Azure, but may also include AWS and GCP</li><li>Knowledge in core Azure services like Azure Kubernetes Service, CosmoDB, Azure Functions, Azure Storage Entities and Concepts, Azure CLI and Powershell Cmdlets</li><li>Knowledge in Azure organizational entities such as Departments, Accounts, Subscriptions, Resource Groups and Management Groups</li></ul><p><br></p><p><u>Skills</u></p><ul><li>Fast learner; proactive thinker</li><li>Ability to innovate, automate, and continually improve processes</li><li>Excellent verbal and written communication skills</li><li>Possess critical thinking and analytical skills</li><li>Capacity to take initiative; desire to become a self-starter</li></ul><p><br></p>
